item.title: 欧佩克+开会讨论延长减产计划
item.description: 6 月 2 日，欧佩克会议期间通往会议室的走廊。【原文：The hallway leading to the meeting room during the OPEC meeting, June 2.】

item.title: 民意调查显示莫迪压倒性获胜，印度股票和债券将上涨
item.description: 在出口民调显示印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）的政党大获全胜后，印度股市、债券和卢比将在周一攀升。【原文：Indian stocks, bonds and the rupee are poised to climb on Monday after exit polls indicated a resounding victory for Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s party.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司启动大规模股票销售，测试投资者胃口
item.description: 阿美石油公司（Aramco）将于周日启动股票销售，为沙特阿拉伯筹集约 120 亿美元，这是近年来最大的交易之一，将考验投资者对沙特王国资产的兴趣。【原文：Aramco will on Sunday kick off a share sale to raise about $12 billion for Saudi Arabia, one of the biggest deals in recent years that will test investor interest in the kingdom’s assets.】

item.title: 韩国金融服务管理局警告新税将导致本地股票外流
item.description: 韩国最高金融监督机构警告说，如果明年按计划征收资本利得税，散户投资者可能会逃离当地股市。【原文：South Korea’s top financial watchdog warned that retail investors might flee the local stock market if a capital-gains tax is introduced as planned next year.】

item.title: 欧洲央行首次降息后，世界利率走势将出现分化：生态周
item.description: 欧洲中央银行周四可能会为欧元走软打开大门，因为其本轮周期的首次降息使该地区走上了与美国不同的政策道路。【原文：The European Central Bank could open the door to a weaker euro on Thursday as its first interest-rate cut of the cycle puts the region on a divergent policy path from the US.】

item.title: 祖马再次否认南非选票不一致指控
item.description: 南非前总统雅各布-祖马（Jacob Zuma）重申了他对计票不准确的指控，尽管选举结果显示他的新党 "前进党"（uMkhonto weSizwe）已经蚕食了执政党非洲人国民党（African National Party）的支持率。【原文：South Africa’s former president, Jacob Zuma, reiterated his allegations about discrepancies in counting of votes even as election results showed that his new uMkhonto weSizwe Party had eaten into the support of the ruling African National Party.】

item.title: 智利总统加布里埃尔-博里奇提出堕胎和安乐死合法化计划
item.description: 智利总统加布里埃尔-博里奇（Gabriel Boric）表示，他将提出一项使堕胎完全合法化的法案，并将加快对安乐死提案的讨论。【原文：Chile President Gabriel Boric said he will introduce a bill to fully legalize abortion and will also accelerate debate on a euthanasia proposal, two plans that face an uphill battle for approval in a divided Congress.】

item.title: 贷款狂潮掩盖了违约损失的上升：信贷周刊
item.description: 上个月，企业利用现金追逐信贷的机会，出售了创纪录的杠杆贷款。然而，只要看一眼违约回收率，就会发现这种债务的风险越来越大。【原文：Companies sold a record volume of leveraged loans last month, taking advantage of the cash chasing credit. A glance at recovery rates for defaults, however, highlights a growing risk in this debt.】

item.title: 未经测试的 ETF 被投资者视为全球混乱的对冲工具
item.description: 中东和欧洲的战争、中美紧张关系、气候变化、新技术的威胁......地缘政治风险无处不在。一些基金经理正在推销一类 ETF，声称能为所有这些不确定性提供对冲。【原文：War in the Middle East and Europe, US-China tensions, climate change, threats from new technologies — geopolitical risk is everywhere. A coterie of fund managers are pitching a class of ETFs that claim to offer a hedge for all that uncertainty.】

item.title: 德国大范围洪灾导致跨境运输中断
item.description: 德国南部和瑞士部分地区的暴雨导致交通和通信严重受阻，周末雷雨天气还将加剧。【原文：Heavy rains in southern Germany and parts of Switzerland caused major disruptions to transport and communications, with thunderstorms set to intensify over the weekend.】

item.title: 关键利率下降，秘鲁 5 月年通胀率达到 2% 的目标
item.description: 秘鲁 5 月份的年度通胀率降幅超过预期，达到中央银行目标区间的中点，是三年多来的最低水平。【原文：Peru’s annual inflation cooled more than expected in May, hitting the mid-point of the central bank’s target range, its lowest level in well over three years.】

item.title: 全美购房者开始反感过高的房价
item.description: 长期以来，美国房地产市场一直受到库存干旱的困扰，现在终于开始出现挂牌量上升的情况。但现在，在许多地方，买家并没有出现。【原文：The US housing market — long crippled by an inventory drought — is finally starting to see listings rise. But now, in many places, the buyers just aren’t showing up.】

item.title: 什么是股票分割？为什么 Nvidia 要拆股？
item.description:
这种做法—已经不像以前那么流行—了，它相当于将一张 10 美元的钞票换成 10 张 1 美元的钞票。【原文：

The practice — which isn't as popular as it once was — is the equivalent of swapping a $10 bill for 10 $1 bills.

】

item.title: 印度初步出口民调显示莫迪领导的政党将赢得多数席位
item.description: 几项早期出口民调显示，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪的政党将在印度大选中连续第三次赢得多数票，从而延长他在这个世界上增长最快的主要经济体执政的十年。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s party is set to win a majority in India’s election for the third time in a row, several early exit polls showed, extending his decade in power atop the world’s fastest-growing major economy.】

item.title: 西班牙检察官称 BBVA 应在间谍调查中接受审判
item.description: 西班牙检察官建议毕尔巴鄂 Vizcaya Argentaria 银行应接受审判，作为对企业间谍指控的广泛刑事调查的一部分。【原文：A Spanish prosecutor has recommended that Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA should stand trial as part of a broad criminal inquiry into alleged corporate spying.】

item.title: 橡树山的奥古斯特说："经济表现好于人们的预期
item.description:
美国的强势有助于信贷市场抵御美联储加息带来的不利因素

。【原文：

US strength helps credit markets weather the headwinds from Fed’s hikes

】

item.title: 世界最大选举接近尾声，莫迪占尽优势：印度投票
item.description: 每天，彭博社记者都会带您走过精选的城镇和城市，为大选投票做准备。【原文：Each day, Bloomberg journalists take you across a selection of towns and cities as they gear up for the big vote.】

item.title: 期权专家担心 S&P 500 指数反弹的持久力
item.description: 随着日历翻到历史上最乏力的一段时期，以及围绕美联储货币宽松前景的种种疑问，投资者对美国股市上涨的韧性表现出越来越多的怀疑。【原文：Investors are showing growing doubts about the resilience of the US stock market’s advance as the calendar flips to a historically feeble stretch and questions swirl around the prospect of Federal Reserve monetary easing.】

item.title: 天空电视台称泰晤士水务公司因股息问题面临 4000 万英镑罚款
item.description: 英国天空电视台（Sky）援引该公司一位消息人士的话报道称，英国自来水供应商泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）因违反股息支付规定而面临超过 4000 万英镑（约合 5100 万美元）的罚款。【原文：UK water supplier Thames Water faces a fine of more than £40 million ($51 million) for breaching rules on dividend payments, Sky reported, citing a source at the company.】

item.title: 伊斯坦布尔市零售通胀率创 2022 年 12 月以来新高
item.description: 伊斯坦布尔的年度零售通胀率加速上升至 2022 年 12 月以来的最高水平，土耳其的物价涨幅在 5 月份达到峰值后，预计将在下半年出现回落。【原文：Istanbul’s annual retail inflation accelerated to the highest level since December 2022, as price increases in Turkey are expected to decline in the second half of the year after reaching a peak in May.】

item.title: 香港称 11 家加密货币交易所更接近获得许可证
item.description: 香港证券监管机构表示，在推出数字资产规则手册以努力培育行业中心一年后，11 家加密货币交易所距离获得牌照又近了一步。【原文：Hong Kong’s securities regulator said 11 cryptocurrency exchanges are a step closer to obtaining licenses, one year after rolling out a digital-asset rulebook to try and foster a hub for the industry.】

item.title: 英国支付监管机构负责人在退款反弹中下台
item.description: 英国支付行业监管机构总经理因欺诈退款新规引起的反弹日益强烈而下台。【原文：The managing director of the UK’s payments-industry regulator is stepping down amid growing backlash over new fraud refund rules.】

item.title: 法国汽车制造商协会称 5 月法国新车销量下降 2.9
item.description: 法国汽车协会（PFA）的统计数据显示，5月份法国新车注册量下降了2.9%，低于2023年同期销量激增的水平。【原文：French new car registrations dropped 2.9% in May, falling short of a surge in sales seen during the same month in 2023, statistics from the PFA auto association showed.】

item.title: 股票交易者驾驭欧盟议会选举指南
item.description: 在下周的欧洲议会选举中，预计民粹主义政党将获得支持，这有可能动摇该集团的气候雄心和政策重点，可再生能源、汽车制造商和工业企业的股票可能会受到影响。【原文：An anticipated boost for populist parties in next week’s European Parliament election is threatening to shake up the bloc’s climate ambitions and policy priorities, with shares in renewable energy, carmakers and industrial firms likely to feel the impact.】

item.title: 节假日刺激澳门博彩收入飙升至科维德事件后新高
item.description: 由于 "黄金周 "假期和新的中国游客旅游许可刺激了消费，5 月份澳门博彩收入跃升 29.7%，达到自科维德（Covid）以来的最高水平。【原文：Macau’s gaming revenue jumped 29.7% in May, rising to its highest level since Covid, as the “Golden Week” holiday and new travel permits for Chinese tourists fueled spending.】

item.title: 瑞银集团埃尔莫蒂指责瑞士监管机构反对新规则
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）将矛头指向监管机构在瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）垮台中所扮演的角色，同时他也在加紧反对政府计划对他所领导的公司实施痛苦的新规则。【原文：UBS Group AG Chief Executive Officer Sergio Ermotti is pointing his finger at the role of regulators in Credit Suisse’s downfall, as he intensifies a campaign against government plans to impose painful new rules on the company he leads.】

item.title: 大选不确定性消除，印度银行家为首次公开募股潮做好准备
item.description: 印度已成为亚洲最热门的股票销售市场，包括首次公开募股。随着大选的结束，大量交易有望创下纪录，因为投资者正试图利用该地区第三大经济体的快速增长。【原文：India has turned into Asia’s hottest market for share sales including initial public offerings, and as elections come to a close, a bumper crop of deals is poised to set a record as investors seek to tap the rapid growth in the region’s third-largest economy.】

item.title: 韩国芯片出口带动贸易增长 推动经济发展
item.description: 在半导体需求的带动下，韩国上个月的出口继续增长，使该国的贸易收支平衡达到了 2020 年以来的最大盈余，支持了政策制定者对今年经济扩张好于预期的乐观情绪。【原文：South Korea’s export growth continued last month, led by demand for semiconductors, boosting the country’s trade balance to the biggest surplus since 2020 and supporting optimism among policymakers for better-than-expected economic expansion this year.】

item.title: 拜登否决国会否决美国证券交易委员会加密货币指南的提案
item.description: 美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）否决了一项国会决议，该决议将否决美国证券交易委员会的指导意见，加密货币行业称该指导意见阻碍了其与银行合作的能力。【原文：President Joe Biden vetoed a congressional resolution that would strike down US Securities and Exchange Commission guidance that the crypto industry says has stymied its ability to work with banks.】

item.title: Cathie Wood 的 Ark Investment 放弃现货以太币 ETF 雄心壮志
item.description: 凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）的方舟投资管理公司（Ark Investment Management）刚刚退出了华尔街推出直接投资第二大加密货币以太币的 ETF 的竞争。【原文：Cathie Wood’s Ark Investment Management just dropped out of the Wall Street race to launch an ETF that invests directly in Ether, the second-largest cryptocurrency.】
